response.overview: Considering that it is impossible to describe a thing as we remember it or as it is brought back to us in the present by images, what is going to be created will necessarily be another thing, a thing which will be similar to a vision or a dream. Maybe it is birth, or fall, the first big moment of transition- and so, of clash, which we are called to. Coming to light, rising, happening, coming to be. At that moment, all the sounds and the images of the people who are close to us, or of the ones who are far and have weaved their passing by with ours unify. Everything is already there at that transitioning moment.  What will come of our life will be that composite knot of sounds and images that will unfold until the dissolution.
response.title: In Fieri
